name: Speculo Hortus
description:
The child looked upon the mirror and found in an instant they was falling through it into a replicated world. Help them collect the five fragments to repair the beautiful mirror and return home to the quaint gardens.

Made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2022

Our team:

  • Benedict Targett - https://twitter.com/SyriphDev

  • Lio Allen - https://twitter.com/bbbunnygaming
    • Character Design, Animation, 2d Art
  • Louis Cook - https://www.instagram.com/louhammers/
    • Music
  • Molly Aldridge - https://twitter.com/molly_aldridge3
    • 2d Art
